price: Ibyo (Allah yategetse; ni byo umuntu ategetswe kubahiriza),[1] kandi uwubahirije imigenzo ya Allah, mu by’ukuri ni bimwe mu bituma imitima igandukira (Allah).
arabic: ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَن يُعَظِّمۡ شَعَٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّهَا مِن تَقۡوَى ٱلۡقُلُوبِ
footnotes: [1] Ibyo Allah yategetse bivugwa muri uyu murongo ni ibyo yategetse mu mirongo yatambutse ya 27, 28, 29, 30, 31

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: dhālika waman yuʿaẓẓim shaʿāira al-lahi fa-innahā min taqwā al-qulūbi
